actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow Federal employees to take time off from duty to serve as bone marrow donors.

summary.text: Allows executive agency employees to take up to five days of leave each year without a reduction in pay or leave to which otherwise entitled in order to donate bone marrow.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow Federal employees to take time off from duty to serve as bone marrow donors.
